title: Python Object-Oriented Programming
about: Learn the principles of object-oriented programming (OOP) in Python, including classes, inheritance, and polymorphism.

title: MySQL Fundamentals
about: Master the basics of MySQL, including database design, SQL queries, and data manipulation.

title: C Programming for Beginners
about: Start your journey into programming with the C language. Learn syntax, data types, and basic algorithms.

title: Data Structures in C++
about: Explore data structures and algorithms in C++. Topics include arrays, linked lists, and sorting algorithms.

title: Algorithm Design and Analysis
about: Dive deep into algorithm design, complexity analysis, and problem-solving techniques.

title: Software Engineering Principles
about: Learn software engineering best practices, including agile development and version control.

title: Problem Solving with Python
about: Enhance your problem-solving skills using Python. Covering algorithms, data structures, and more.

title: AWS Cloud Computing Fundamentals
about: Introduction to AWS cloud services, including EC2, S3, and Lambda functions.

title: Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms
about: Explore advanced data structures and algorithmic concepts, such as graphs and dynamic programming.
